statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Now given two kinds of coins A and B,which satisfy that GCD(A,B)=1.Here you can assume that there are enough coins for both kinds.Please calculate the maximal value that you cannot pay and  the total number that you cannot pay.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The input will consist of a series of pairs of integers A and B, separated by a space, one pair of integers per line.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each pair of input integers A and B you should output the the maximal value that you cannot pay and  the total number that you cannot pay, and with one line of output for each line in input.
